title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
desc:
This was inspired by the 1951 short story "The Sentinel" by Arthur C. Clarke.

Arthur C. Clarke also wrote the novel 2001: A Space Odyssey concurrently with the film's screenplay (collaborating with director Stanley Kubrick), which was published shortly after the film's release.

title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire‚Äôs Assistant
desc:
This is based on Vampire Blood, the first trilogy of the book series The Saga of Darren Shan by Darren Shan.

The Vampire Blood trilogy consists of the books Cirque du Freak (also known as A Living Nightmare), The Vampire's Assistant and Tunnels of Blood, all of which were published in 2000.
